# UISplitViewController.BackgroundStyle.none

**Case**

A style that has no visual effect on the background appearance of the primary view controller.

## Declaration

```swift
case none
```

## Background styles

- **UISplitViewController.BackgroundStyle.sidebar**: A style that applies a blurred effect to the background of the primary view controller.
